name: Coronal Microshunt
desc: A coronal microshunt is integrated into the hull. It grants incredible power and access to ARC whitespace technologies.

name: Aux Microshunt
desc: A coronal microshunt is integrated into the hull. It grants incredible power and access to ARC whitespace technologies.

name: Variable Coordinator
desc: This ship sustains a low-grade wideband whitespace field which improves the properties of other whitespace ships

name: Variable Sheath
desc: This ship is sheathed in a low-grade whitespace field which can be altered by the ship to change various properties

name: Hilbert Charged Armor
desc: A lattice of shimmering twilight armor plates have been integrated into the ship. Each armor block is laminated with a continuously shifting coating rumored to be created by an Archotech AI.

name: ARC Auxiliary
desc: This ship, while lacking a coronal microshunt or whitespace field, is able to inefficiently sustain ARC technologies and has been refitted to incorporate them
